sentences.sContent: The sibyl ("witch" is such an uncouth label) responded with a supply constriction designed to drive up the price.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sibyl ("witch" is such an uncouth label) responded with a supply constriction designed to drive up the price.
sentences.sCn: 女预言家（“女巫”听上去让人不太舒服）则用限制供应的方法来应对，意在推升价格。

trans.tranOther: (in ancient Greece and Rome) any of a number of women believed to be oracles or prophetesses, one of the most famous being the sibyl of Cumae, who guided Aeneas through the underworld
